title: Mobile tax hike may hinder digital future, warns GSMA
text: islamabad julian gorman head asia pacific gsma expressed concerns pakistan recent increase taxes mobile phone manufacturing could jeopardise gsma smartphone initiative talking media mr gorman highlighted mobile phone penetration pakistan currently per cent figure exceed pc given country substantial youth population noted less pc mobile users pakistan smartphones limiting access fintech essential digital services gsma said pakistan lacks vision direction digitalisation necessary achieve targets digital pakistan initiative mr gorman also announced third gsma digital nation summit take place islamabad august event first pakistan gather stakeholders including investors innovators regulatory authorities various countries discuss path towards digital transformation pakistan potential become knowledge based economy innovation technology drive economic growth enhance governance said stressed need implement regulatory actions taken regard observed pakistan various authorities compete restrict digitalisation instead complementing mr gorman added said estimated mobile phones total economic impact pakistan economy reached billion still average revenue per user arpu less discourage new investors entering pakistani markets besides heavy taxation discouraged investors innovators entering pakistan market mr gorman said however government apparatus essential services digital potential available country published dawn june th

title: State Life Insurance Corporation, Daman Investments sign partnership deal

testified prophet muhammad pbuh allah messenger sent mercy worlds allah commanded follow prophet pbuh follow allah messenger commands succeed world hereafter alcohol gambling satanic acts warned imam
